nodes.text: This time period, following the Manderon Period, lasted until the outbreak of the Great Sith War that marked the beginning of the Old Sith Wars in 4000 BBY.
Timeline from the Manderon Period until the Old Sith Wars

This time period has not been explicitly identified, although Daniel Wallace has indicated that it might be part of a larger Sidereal Era. No official sources in canon have confirmed this as the dating scheme for the Sidereal Era mentioned in The Constancia Affair has not been fully revealed.
